result.eng: Does your father remember those days?
result.ga: An gcuimhin le d'athair na laethanta sin
result.orig: An gcuimhin le d'athair na laethanta sin
result.html: An gcuimhin le d'athair na laethanta sinDoes your father remember those days?
result.ponchtml: An gcuiṁin le d'aṫair na laeṫanta sinDoes your father remember those days?

result.eng: The father from whom he got that habit.
result.ga: An t-athair ónar thóg sé an nós sin
result.orig: An t-athair ónar thóg sé an nós sin
result.html: An t-athair ónar thóg sé an nós sinThe father from whom he got that habit.
result.ponchtml: An t-aṫair ónar ṫóg sé an nós sinThe father from whom he got that habit.

result.eng: The Irish-language cause was very dear to my father.
result.ga: Ba mhór cúis na Gaeilge le m'athair
result.orig: Ba mhór cúis na Gaeilge le m'athair
result.html: Ba mhór cúis na Gaeilge le m'athairThe Irish-language cause was very dear to my father.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁór cúis na Gaeilge le m'aṫairThe Irish-language cause was very dear to my father.

result.eng: Your father will be in good health again before long.
result.ga: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfad
result.orig: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfad
result.html: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfadYour father will be in good health again before long.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ d'aṫair ina ẛláinte arís sul i ḃfadYour father will be in good health again before long.

result.eng: It was very strange meeting my father for the first time.
result.ga: Bhí sé an-aisteach bualadh le m'athair don chéad uair
result.orig: Bhí sé an-aisteach bualadh le m'athair don chéad uair
result.html: Bhí sé an-aisteach bualadh le m'athair don chéad uairIt was very strange meeting my father for the first time.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé an-aisteaċ bualaḋ le m'aṫair don ċéad uairIt was very strange meeting my father for the first time.

result.eng: He was ready to take revenge for the death of his father.
result.ga: Bhí sé réidh le díoltas a bhaint amach as bás a athar
result.orig: Bhí sé réidh le díoltas a bhaint amach as bás a athar
result.html: Bhí sé réidh le díoltas a bhaint amach as bás a atharHe was ready to take revenge for the death of his father.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé réiḋ le díoltas a ḃaint amaċ as bás a aṫarHe was ready to take revenge for the death of his father.

result.eng: He would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ga: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.orig: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.html: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ponchtml: Ḋéanfaḋ sé aon rud ċun díoltas a ḃaint as toisc gur ṁaraiġ sé a aṫairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.

result.eng: My father has a Toyota but I have a Ford.
result.ga: Tá Toyota ag m'athair ach tá Ford agamsa
result.orig: Tá Toyota ag m'athair ach tá Ford agamsa
result.html: Tá Toyota ag m'athair ach tá Ford agamsaMy father has a Toyota but I have a Ford.
result.ponchtml: Tá Toyota ag m'aṫair aċ tá Ford agamsaMy father has a Toyota but I have a Ford.

result.eng: Dónal is the father and Áine is the mother.
result.ga: Is é Dónall an t-athair agus is í Áine an mháthair
result.orig: Is é Dónall an t-athair agus is í Áine an mháthair
result.html: Is é Dónall an t-athair agus is í Áine an mháthairDónal is the father and Áine is the mother.
result.ponchtml: Is é Dónall an t-aṫair agus is í Áine an ṁáṫairDónal is the father and Áine is the mother.

result.eng: I get on better with my father than with my mother.
result.ga: Réitím níos fearr le m'athair ná le mo mháthair
result.orig: Réitím níos fearr le m'athair ná le mo mháthair
result.html: Réitím níos fearr le m'athair ná le mo mháthairI get on better with my father than with my mother.
result.ponchtml: Réitím níos fearr le m'aṫair ná le mo ṁáṫairI get on better with my father than with my mother.

result.html: Feicim m'athair go minicI see my father often.
result.ponchtml: Feicim m'aṫair go minicI see my father often.

result.eng: My mother and father are from Belfast.
result.ga: Is as Béal Feirste do mo mháthair agus m'athair
result.orig: Is as Béal Feirste do mo mháthair agus m'athair
result.html: Is as Béal Feirste do mo mháthair agus m'athairMy mother and father are from Belfast.
result.ponchtml: Is as Béal Feirste do mo ṁáṫair agus m'aṫairMy mother and father are from Belfast.

result.eng: I'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
result.ga: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraige
result.orig: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraige
result.html: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraigeI'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
result.ponchtml: Inseoiḋ mise do m'aṫair air é aċ é a ṫeaċt ón ḟarraigeI'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.

result.eng: I often heard my father talking about you.
result.ga: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ort
result.orig: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ort
result.html: Is minic a chuala mé m'athair ag scéalaíocht ortI often heard my father talking about you.
result.ponchtml: Is minic a ċuala mé m'aṫair ag scéalaíoċt ortI often heard my father talking about you.

result.ga: An bhfuil sé inleighis a shagairt
result.orig: An bhfuil sé inleighis a shagairt
result.html: An bhfuil sé inleighis a shagairtCan he be cured, father?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil sé inleiġis a ẛagairtCan he be cured, father?
